name: Bowl Movement Details Constraint
message: Bowl must move left with a speed of 10 when left arrow key is pressed.

name: Banana Falling Details
message: Banana must fall down in steps of size 7.

name: Apple Spawn Random X Position Constraint
Banana Spawn Random X Position Constraint
Apple Points Constraint
message: Apples must give 5 points when they hit the bowl.

name: Apple Game Over Constraint
message: Apple did not touch the ground.

name: Apple Game Over Message Constraint
message: Apple did not touch the ground.

name: Banana Bowl Points Constraint
message: Bananas must give 8 points when they hit the bowl.

name: Banana Ground Points Constraint
message: Bananas must subtract 8 points when they hit the floor.

name: Timer Tick Constraint
message: Timer did not tick at all.

name: Timer Game Over Constraint
message: Bananas must not move after game is over (should be over).

name: Timer Game Over Message Constraint
message: Bowl must display a message after 30 seconds.
